channel.title: The Seven Blades of Dispare
channel.description:
I am currently working on something, originally, I just wanted to make a simple sword but i ended up with this. Please suggest some colors, or textures, and a name. :) Also, I want this weapon to hit like u have no weapon at all, like punching, how would I do that? Or is here a better attacking animation?
Pics: Fits nice and snug on his arm. [img]http://img140.imageshack.us/img140/230/29756371.png[/img]
Just another view. [img]http://img513.imageshack.us/img513/8475/87075151.png[/img]
I kinda want him to wield it like a sword, but if there is another better way to wield it, please suggest it :)
PLEASE IF YOU HAVE SUGGESTIONS TELL ME!
*This was made 100% on my own, no other pictures used, 100% primitives.* *Please suggest below!* *Took me about 40 or 50 mins to do. I could probably re-create this in a matter of minutes tho.*
EDIT1: Maybe I should make him wield it in both hands :o EDIT2: I think it should attack normally like the Rune Claws special attack, but I don't know how to do it, can some one help please?

item.title: The Seven Blades of Dispare
item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

[quote=“runeite51, post:6, topic:299885”][quote author=dylan_0789 link=topic=396177.msg2943263#msg2943263 date=1252035697]
looks like a 10 min cheap version of the “Handblades” i made awhile back.
[/quote]

Lol, I hope you’re not thinking I got it from you…[/quote]
no, im just saying the idea is similar, it looks NOTHING like mine, lmao. was just speaking my mind

Read full topic

item.title: The Seven Blades of Dispare
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“runeite51, post:6, topic:299885”][quote author=dylan_0789 link=topic=396177.msg2943263#msg2943263 date=1252035697]
looks like a 10 min cheap version of the “Handblades” i made awhile back.
[/quote]

Lol, I hope you’re not thinking I got it from you…[/quote]
Dylan most likely doesnt, otherwise he would mention it. He is a fairly honest person to my knowledge.

EDIT - i suggest, making it run from a primitive circle, instead of his wrist. And in the middel of a prim circle use a prim cylinder for a handle, and make it kinda like that, I say this because i done believe datmaker will animate this correctly, to how it needs

Read full topic

item.title: The Seven Blades of Dispare
item.dc:creator: @runeite51 runeite51
item.description:
@runeite51 wrote:

[quote=“King Lingerz, post:3, topic:299885”]Make it smaller, add another one and wield them like claws, but also armoured gloves. (Like the steel gloves in recipe for disaster). Then in game it goes in the weapon slot but removes gloves too. This idea would give defence and attack as well as looking alright.

Then you could have these attack styles:

1: Punch (Punch emote)
2: Slash (Sword slash emote)
3: Block (Punch emote)

But hey, these are just my ideas, it’s your model. :)[/quote]

I like the idea, im gona wait to other suggestions though. Not a bad idea

Read full topic

item.title: The Seven Blades of Dispare
item.dc:creator: @King_Lingerz King Lingerz
item.description:
@King_Lingerz wrote:

Make it smaller, add another one and wield them like claws, but also armoured gloves. (Like the steel gloves in recipe for disaster). Then in game it goes in the weapon slot but removes gloves too. This idea would give defence and attack as well as looking alright.

Then you could have these attack styles:

1: Punch (Punch emote)
2: Slash (Sword slash emote)
3: Block (Punch emote)

But hey, these are just my ideas, it’s your model.

Read full topic
